d1_flags: 1. goto C74999 if GIYGAS_DEFEATED is set
d1_text:
Npc0343:
[GOTO_IF_FLAG GIYGAS_DEFEATED L_C74999]
ï¿½(I'm not an enemy.[PAUSE 20]  I'm just a friendly mole.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I'll tell you how to distinguish between your friends and enemies.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½It's easy to tell an enemy just by looking at them.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Enemies look like humans with weird-colored faces.[PAUSE 15]  Beware of them.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½However... you can't get more powerful if you avoid your enemies.)[HALT][END]
